TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BinaryClientFormatterSink extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientFormatterSink, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink
Public Class BinaryClientFormatterSink Implements IChannelSinkBase, IClientChannelSink, IClientFormatterSink, IMessageSink

summary.span: 为使用 的客户端格式化程序接收器提供实现。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a client formatter sink that uses the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化程序接收器的作用是生成所需的标头并将消息序列化为流。The function of the formatter sink is to generate the necessary headers and serialize the message to the stream. 格式化程序接收器之后转发到通过链中的所有接收器或调用。After the formatter sink, the is forwarded to all sinks in the chain through the or calls. 在此阶段消息已序列化，并且仅作为信息提供。At this stage the message has already been serialized and is provided as information only. 需要创建或修改消息的接收器必须放置在之前格式化程序接收器链中。Sinks that need to create or modify the message must be placed in the sink chain before the formatter. 这通过实现轻松地实现接口，使具有对格式化程序接收器的引用的效果。This is easily achieved by implementing the interface, which gives the impression of having a reference to the formatter sink. 然后可以将真实的格式化程序接收器放到该接收器链中后面的位置上。The real formatter sink can then be placed later in the sink chain. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|指定格式化程序是否将包括版本信息。Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information. 值为`true`或`false`。Values are `true` or `false`.| > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用此对象的实例与不受信任的数据或在不安全通道会带来安全风险。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk. 使用此对象仅与受信任的数据以及跨安全通道。Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).
